title: Ticket #1023: [RFE] Provide a means to get console dumps for VMs
description:
For at least debugging purposes, it would be useful to get a VM's console dumped to an output file.

This is possible via libvirt.
remarks:

Maybe this could be an EXIT_HOOK.
